JsonXsltSender
SendersEndpoint
Perform an XSLT transformation with a specified stylesheet on a JSON input, yielding JSON, yielding JSON, XML or text. JSON input is transformed into XML map, array, string, integer and boolean elements, in the namespace http://www.w3.org/2013/XSL/json. The XSLT stylesheet or XPathExpression operates on these element.
See also
https://www.xml.com/articles/2017/02/14/why-you-should-be-using-xslt-30/
Github - JsonXsltSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.senders.JsonXsltSender
Syntax
Copy
<JsonXsltSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
jsonResult	boolean	true
If true, the xml result of the transformation is converted back to json
namespaceDefs	text	j=http://www.w3.org/2013/XSL/json
Namespace definitions for xpathExpression. Must be in the form of a com
